name: Neutron Star (ryanalexmartin)
description:
Neutron stars are heavy.  And they bend space time.

With that in mind, and your anti-matter platform in your hand, how long can you keep the neutron star balanced on the platform?

Don't drop it!

Made in 4 days for Weekly Game Jam #18.

Concept and art help from @g33kidd

Controls:  Mouse to move platform.  That's all.
